segments.text: Good evening , sir . Are you ready to order now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'd like to try Chinese food . But I don't know anything about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Chinese food is divided into eight big cuisines , such as Cantonese food , Sichuan food , Fujisan food , etc . Our restaurant is famous for Sichuan style .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there any difference between Cantonese food and Sichuan food ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Cantonese food is lighter while Sichuan food is spicy and hot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I like hot food . Can you make a few suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about the eggplant and minced pork in dry red chili sauce and the ' Tofu ' beancurd ? They are our specialties .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I ’ ll have them . Is there any soup ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Sour soup of Sichuan style . It's our chef ’ s recommendation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s fine . I'll have a try .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sir , your dish will take 5 minutes to prepare . While waiting , would you like anything to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , sir . We'll try our best to serve you as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S1
